Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GameUtils.Entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Projectile, Ship

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The Entity class is a abstract class to handle entitys. Things like speed, pos, size and direction
